sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Compares two images stored as sys_attachment records using the Gemini model and returns a textual analysis of their differences and similarities. Optionally, a custom prompt can be provided to guide the comparison. If no prompt is given, a general comparison is performed.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description: Compares two images stored as sys_attachment records using the Gemini model and returns a textual analysis of their differences and similarities. Optionally, a custom prompt can be provided to guide the comparison. If no prompt is given, a general comparison is performed.
